mapper.sql: id, longitude, latitude, canteen_id, tenant_id, canteen_name, area_id, description, update_time, safetyone, safetytwo, safetythree
mapper.insert:
insert into t_canteen_location
id,
longitude,
latitude,
canteen_id,
tenant_id,
canteen_name,
area_id,
description,
update_time,
safetyone,
safetytwo,
safetythree,

mapper.update:
update t_canteen_location
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
canteen_name = #{canteenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetythree = #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_canteen_location set longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canteen_name = #{canteenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetythree = #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT canteen_id,tenant_id,canteen_name,description, (POWER(MOD(ABS(longitude - #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}),360),2) + POWER(ABS(latitude - #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}),2)) AS distance FROM t_canteen_location
